item.title: Learning to Desire Pain as a Tai Chi Exercise
item.description: In response to Transforming Conflict with Tai Chi, many of you sent me stories of situations where you were forced into a tense encounter and you had to draw on your practice to get you through it. After, you feel relief and you can move on, but sometimes the idea slips through that, "hey, I'm a little better able to handle this kind of thing because of the way I faced it.
